title: Value when a tangent slope has a specific value

content.description: Let f be the function defined by f(x) = ln(x2 + 1), and let g be the function defined by g(x) = x5 + x3. The line tangent to the graph of f at x = 2 is parallel to the line tangent to the graph of g at x = a, where a is a positive constant.
content.question: What is the value of a ?

topic.text: 2.2: Defining the Derivative of a Function and Using Derivative Notation

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
